location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Musemir looking North from below camp of the Hants Regt. January and February 1904.’

mods.abstract: Reproduction of a black-ink illustration of a landscape, with a plain in the foreground and mountains in the background. Tents, forming part of the Commissariat Camp can be seen to the right of the illustration. Buildings comprising the village of Musemir [Al Musaymīr] can be seen towards the centre of the illustration. Some features of the illustration, including mountain peaks, Musemir and the Commissariat Camp, are annotated.
